verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Unto thee do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, O thou that sittest <S%H3427><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.

Behold <S%H5869><s%>, as the eyes of servants <S%H5650><s%> look unto the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their master <S%H113><s%>, As the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of a maid <S%H8198><s%> unto the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her mistress <S%H1404><s%>; So our eyes <S%H5869><s%> look unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, Until he have mercy upon us <S%H2603><s%>.
Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon us <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon us <S%H7227><s%>; For we are exceedingly filled <S%H7646><s%> with contempt <S%H937><s%>.

Our soul <S%H5315><s%> is exceedingly <S%H7227><s%> filled <S%H7646><s%> With the scoffing <S%H3933><s%> of those that are at ease <S%H7600><s%>, And with the contempt <S%H937><s%> of the proud <S%H1343><s%>.
